bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Ethernet
Amendment 3: Physical Layer Specifications and Management Parameters for 40 Gb/s and 100 Gb/s Operation over Fiber Optic Cables
IEEE Standard for Ethernet - Amendment 3: Physical Layer Specifications and Management Parameters for 40 Gb/s and 100 Gb/s Operation over Fiber Optic Cables
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 802.3bm-2015 (Amendment to IEEE Std 802.3-2012 as amended by IEEE Std 802.3bk-2013 and IEEE Std 802.3bj-2014 )

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Physical Layer specifications and management parameters for 40 Gb/s operation over single-mode fiber (40GBASE-ER4) and for 100 Gb/s operation over multimode fiber (100GBASE-SR4) are added by this amendment. This amendment also specifies a four-lane variant of the 100 Gigabit Attachment Unit Interface (CAUI-4) and optional Energy Efficient Ethernet (EEE) for 40 Gb/s and 100 Gb/s operation over fiber optic cables.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
